name: infuseproduct/gcal-tag-filter
description: WordPress plugin for displaying Google Calendar events with tag-based filtering

post-install-cmd: bash -c 'cd vendor/google/apiclient-services/src && ls -1 | grep -v "^Calendar" | grep -v "^Resource" | xargs rm -rf || true'
post-update-cmd: bash -c 'cd vendor/google/apiclient-services/src && ls -1 | grep -v "^Calendar" | grep -v "^Resource" | xargs rm -rf || true'
